Scope and Contents
This collection includes research files related to a series of Spanish Civil War history projects and books on which Calese collaborated with Alvah Bessie, Carl Geiser, Randall B. Smith and others. Contains copies of SCW-era (and some later) correspondence, documents, ephemera and publications, including material in Spanish and Russian.
